title: TalkMeUp | Your AI-Powered Communication Coach
byline: Executive Vice President & Chief Legal Officer, Hearst
content:
Transform

Elevate communication, drive business growth

At TalkMeUp, transformation goes beyond refining communication. We immerse training in real-world scenarios, ensuring skills are naturally integrated into daily interactions. With our data-driven insights, businesses can make informed decisions, recognizing strengths and growth areas. Our streamlined process boosts strategy clarity, enhances customer relations, and drives tangible business growth.

excerpt: TalkMeUp's next generation AI-based practice and coaching capabilities eliminate the need for time-consuming manual reviewing and scoring of videos.
